VideoTitle: Preparing for the Windows 8.1 MCSA Certification: (02) Installing & Upgrading to Windows 8.1
Author: JeffKoch
Description: This module outlines planning considerations for a deploying Windows 8.1 in an enterprise. You will understand the pathways to upgrading your organization from Windows XP, Windows Vista, and Windows 7

ShowName: Preparing for the Windows 8.1 MCSA Certification
VideoTitle: Preparing for the Windows 8.1 MCSA Certification: (03) Configuring & Managing Windows 8.1
Author: JeffKoch
Description: This module provides an overview of local and remote management tools to administrative events, logs, and resources. Also, see how PowerShell is used to configure and manage Windows 8.1 using PowerShe

ShowName: Preparing for the Windows 8.1 MCSA Certification
VideoTitle: Preparing for the Windows 8.1 MCSA Certification: (04) Implementing an Application Strategy for Windows 8.1
Author: JeffKoch
Description: This module provides an overview of application deployment for Windows 8.1. You'll see how to implement application restrictions for an enterprise using Software Restriction Policies (SRP). [00:25] -

ShowName: Preparing for the Windows 8.1 MCSA Certification
VideoTitle: Preparing for the Windows 8.1 MCSA Certification: (05) Managing Devices & Resource Access
Author: JeffKoch
Description: This module highlights Windows 8.1 bring your own device (BYOD) scenarios for enterprises. Understand how to manage non-domain member devices using new features such as Workplace Join and Work Folders

ShowName: Preparing for the Windows 8.1 MCSA Certification
VideoTitle: Preparing for the Windows 8.1 MCSA Certification: (06) Securing Windows 8.1 Devices
